titles.title: Declaring that the warm relations and bilateral exchanges between the people of the United States and the people of Taiwan should continue and grow deeper, recognizing the important contributions of Taiwanese-Americans to the United States, and supporting the goals and ideals of Taiwanese-American Heritage Week.

Declaring that the warm relations and bilateral exchanges between the people of the United States and the people of Taiwan should continue and grow deeper, recognizing the important contributions of Taiwanese-Americans to the United States, and supporting the goals and ideals of Taiwanese-American Heritage Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Declares that the warm relations and bilateral exchanges between the U.S. people and the Taiwanese people should continue and grow deeper.
Recognizes the important contributions of Taiwanese-Americans to the United States.
Supports the goals and ideals of Taiwanese-American Heritage Week.
